children.name: a
children.sourceText: And ye have led away much of this people that they pervert the right way of God, and keep not the law of Moses which is the right way; and convert the law of Moses into the worship of a being which ye say shall come many hundred years hence.

children.name: about
children.sourceText: Brother Jacob, I have sought much opportunity that I might speak unto you; for I have heard and also know that thou goest about much, preaching that which ye call the gospel, or the doctrine of Christ.

children.name: and
children.sourceText: Brother Jacob, I have sought much opportunity that I might speak unto you; for I have heard and also know that thou goest about much, preaching that which ye call the gospel, or the doctrine of Christ.

children.name: because
children.sourceText: And because I have thus lied unto God I greatly fear lest my case shall be awful; but I confess unto God.

children.name: before
children.sourceText: Gather together on the morrow, for I shall die; wherefore, I desire to speak unto the people before I shall die.

children.name: but
children.sourceText: If there should be a Christ, I would not deny him; but I know that there is no Christ, neither has been, nor ever will be.

children.name: by
children.sourceText: Show me a sign by this power of the Holy Ghost, in the which ye know so much.

children.name: for
children.sourceText: Brother Jacob, I have sought much opportunity that I might speak unto you; for I have heard and also know that thou goest about much, preaching that which ye call the gospel, or the doctrine of Christ.

children.name: he
children.sourceText: And now behold, I, Sherem, declare unto you that this is blasphemy; for no man knoweth of such things; for he cannot tell of things to come.

children.name: him
children.sourceText: If there should be a Christ, I would not deny him; but I know that there is no Christ, neither has been, nor ever will be.

children.name: I
children.sourceText: Brother Jacob, I have sought much opportunity that I might speak unto you; for I have heard and also know that thou goest about much, preaching that which ye call the gospel, or the doctrine of Christ.

children.name: if

children.name: in
children.sourceText: Show me a sign by this power of the Holy Ghost, in the which ye know so much.

children.name: into
children.sourceText: And ye have led away much of this people that they pervert the right way of God, and keep not the law of Moses which is the right way; and convert the law of Moses into the worship of a being which ye say shall come many hundred years hence.

children.name: lest
children.sourceText: I fear lest I have committed the unpardonable sin, for I have lied unto God; for I denied the Christ, and said that I believed the scriptures; and they truly testify of him.

children.name: many
children.sourceText: And ye have led away much of this people that they pervert the right way of God, and keep not the law of Moses which is the right way; and convert the law of Moses into the worship of a being which ye say shall come many hundred years hence.
